summary: Comprehensive testing of PT Garuda Yamato Steel Intranet CMS - All requested features verified and working: User Management with roles (admin/editor/viewer), News Detail Page, Photo Albums, Hero Settings with visual effect toggles, File Upload in admin panels, Custom categories for News, and Events page with role-based Add Event button visibility.
passed_tests: Backend: Auth login with admin credentials (admin@gys.co.id / admin123)
Backend: Auth login rejection with invalid credentials (401)
Backend: Auth /me endpoint requires authentication
Backend: User Management CRUD - Create/Read/Update/Delete users
Backend: User roles (admin, editor, viewer) working correctly
Backend: News CRUD with custom category support
Backend: News detail by ID endpoint
Backend: Albums CRUD operations
Backend: Photos CRUD with album assignment
Backend: Photo file upload returns base64 data URL
Backend: Hero settings GET with visual effect toggles
Backend: Hero settings PUT - toggle particles/gradient/cards
Backend: Events CRUD with auth protection
Frontend: Admin login page with demo credentials
Frontend: Admin dashboard with stat cards (News: 6, Events: 5, Photos: 8, Employees: 8)
Frontend: User Management - Add User dialog with role selector (Admin/Editor/Viewer)
Frontend: News Management - Add/Edit dialog with custom category option (Other Custom)
Frontend: News Management - File upload and Featured toggle
Frontend: Gallery Management - Albums tab with photo count
Frontend: Gallery Management - Add Album with cover image upload
Frontend: Gallery Management - Add Photo with file upload
Frontend: Hero Settings - Visual Effects toggles (Particles, Gradient Overlay, Floating Cards)
Frontend: Hero Settings - Image upload and live preview
Frontend: News list page with category filters
Frontend: News Detail page with full content, share buttons, related news
Frontend: Events page - Calendar component (shadcn, not browser default)
Frontend: Events page - Add Event button HIDDEN for public/non-admin users
Frontend: Events page - Add Event button VISIBLE for admin users
critical_code_review_comments: server.py line 498 has unreachable code (duplicate return statement after the loop)
seed_data_creation: Seed data already present via /api/seed endpoint
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features implemented and working. Backend API tests in /app/backend/tests/test_gys_api.py cover auth, users, news, albums, photos, hero settings, events, and file upload. Frontend verified via Playwright - all admin pages accessible, role-based access working (Add Event button hidden for non-admin).
